meanings.definition: The quality or state of being recent.
meanings.sent1: The recentnesses of the news made everyone excited.
meanings.sent2: The recentnesses of the technology updates are impressive.
meanings.sent3: The recentnesses of the jokes at the party kept everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The recentnesses of the morning dew on the grass felt refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The recentnesses of the paint on the walls brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: The state of being recent; newness.
meanings.sent1: The recentnesses of the fashion trends are always changing.
meanings.sent2: The recentnesses of the data show promising results.
meanings.sent3: The recentnesses of the cake at the party was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: The recentnesses of the stars in the night sky captivated her.
meanings.sent5: The recentnesses of the flowers in the garden brought joy to all.
